name: Dribbble Invite
caption: dribbble.com
description: Alright, I've got an invite and would like to add a great talent to this community :) Send me your best work at levani.ambokadze@gmail.com You...

data.message:
Read the policy. 

All your posts are coming from hootsuite, they're about an hour apart and exactly the same on the Egyptian web designers group with the same time stamps.

If anything, it tells me two things, a) this is running a schedule b) you're showing no courtesy to the community here by actually taking the time and posting yourself something relevant.

You posted 4 posts, two of them creative design oriented and one is in the gray.

Dear Hady Ahmed, I'm the founder of Egyptian Web Designer group, I'm also participating in one other secret group, and my own profile. I use HootSuite because it saves a lot of time instead of posted here, then here, then here.

I'm working as a Senior Front End Engineer, kinda geek as well, but I admit some of the posts I made here are irrelevant somehow, since it's related to inspiration regards UI/UX,..etc However I thought this might be interesting :)

Geek, kinda geek (albeit I disapprove this term and the one next) or wannabe geek are all welcomed here. 
This is a place for those with passion towards technology at large and software in specific.

Nonetheless the pattern is alarming and the policy is clear about auto posting. The reason it's there because this isn't a link sharing group, it's here for discussions, debates and questions.

Be it around a link, a topic, an event or anything else is irrelevant,  only thing that should be relevant is the content :)

Anyway, we're not in disagreement, like I mentioned earlier the pattern was alarming.
